title: Mandagon
notes:
A lot of stuttering on High Quality graphics option (possible VSYNC on*). Seems to be flawless when running with the "Fastest" option.
* VSYNC on seems to be a general issue on my setup with many games getting this same stuttering issue

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2

notes: Doesn't start. An error message pops up that asks to send the generated crash report to the developer. Steam still shows that the game is running and you have to manually kill a bunch of .exe processes to actually stop the game. No Proton log is generated either.
